name: Maestitia
description:
Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1 submission - A very short game I made in memory of our cat Jacob who passed away recently - Theme was "This is not real" - Destroy enough darkness and reach the glowing light on the other side of the room. WASD and mouse controls.

Credit

Music - Alexander Nakarada from chosic.com

Sound effects - Magic Spells SFX Bundle from humble bundle

-Unreal assets used-

Liam by akishaqs, CartoonCelShader, Luos 8 Elements , Toon Cats , Stylized town asset pack, and VFX warp pack
